meanings.definition: A painting or other work of art executed directly on a wall.
meanings.sent1: The colorful mural brightened up the school wall.
meanings.sent2: The mural depicted a beautiful landscape in the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel in the mural seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a mural of happiness on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The mural of the underwater world made the room feel like an ocean sanctuary.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a wall.
meanings.sent1: The mural artist used special paints for the wall design.
meanings.sent2: The mural painting added a unique touch to the wall decor.
meanings.sent3: The playful cat thought the mural wall was a giant canvas.
meanings.sent4: The old bricks told stories of the mural past on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The mural pattern on the wall created a cozy atmosphere in the room.
